page.title: 14Mystery Animal.
page.content: For two years there has been reports in the area of a mysterious animal with more than a hundred alleged sightings.It is generally described as panther-like and bigger than an alsation dog. A number of sheep have been killed or gone missing around the area of Parkhurst Forest.Some have been found with savage wounds with a side torn open and eaten away.The wounds are not such as would be expected from a dog or a fox.Many local people are sceptical about the existence of any unusual animal in the area but others believe a large member of the cat family is at large and some are reluctant to venture out in the countryside alone at night.
